text: Viktor Mikhaylovich Zimin (: August 23, 1962 – November 23, 2020) was a Russian politician. He was Chairman of the Government of the Republic of Khakassia from 2009 until 2018. In 2018, he lost his bid for re-election to a third term in the first round of voting. Zimin died in Moscow on November 23, 2020 from COVID-19 at the age of 58.Скончался экс-глава Хакасии Виктор Зимин ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website *Biography Category:1962 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Moscow Category:Russian politicians Category:Khakassia
title: Viktor Zimin (politician)
